chapter.title: Packaging &LIBGDA; UI extension
chapter.para: &LIBGDA; UI extension builds on top of &LIBGDA; and GTK+ to provide some graphical widgets, a control center (to manage DSN and list installed providers) and a browser program to analyze the contents of a database.

sect1.title: Overview of the components
sect1.para:
&LIBGDA; UI's components are:
the runtime files (shared library)
the GObject introspection files (to be used by the GObject introspection framework)
the tools, which require the runtime component
the development files (the includes to compile C programs)

Please note:
the documentation and localization files are mixed with &LIBGDA;'s ones
the tools have been described here as a separate component but it is highly recomended to bundle the tools with the runtime as they provide essential tools to the end user.

sect1.title: Runtime component
sect1.para:
This component is the base component for Libgda UI, required by any application which uses &LIBGDA;' UI, extension, it contains the following files (located under the installation directory):
. |-- lib | |-- libgda-6.0 | | |-- plugins | | | |-- gdaui-entry-filesel-spec.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-password.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-pict-spec.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-pict-spec_string.xml | | | |-- gdaui-entry-text-spec.xml | | | `-- libgdaui-plugins.so | |-- libgda-ui-6.0.so -> libgda-ui-6.0.so.4.1.0 | |-- libgda-ui-6.0.so.4 -> libgda-ui-6.0.so.4.1.0 | `-- libgda-ui-6.0.so.4.1.0 `-- share `-- libgda-6.0 |-- language-specs | `-- gda-sql.lang |-- server_operation.glade `-- ui |-- gdaui-entry-string-number.xml `-- gdaui-entry-string-string.xml
This component should be made dependent on the &LIBGDA;'s runtime component.

sect1.title: GObject introspection
sect1.para:
If GObject introspection has been compiled, &LIBGDA;'s UI extension's introspection files are:
|-- share | `-- gir-1.0 | `-- Gdaui-6.0.gir `-- lib `-- girepository-1.0 `-- Gdaui-6.0.typelib

sect2.title: Control center
sect2.para:
The control center's files are:
. |-- bin | `-- gda-control-center-6.0 `-- share |-- applications | `-- gda-control-center-6.0.desktop `-- libgda-6.0 `-- pixmaps `-- gdaui-generic.png

sect2.title: Gda browser
sect2.para:
The GdaBrowser can be packaged separately, but it depends on the runtime component and the UI extension runtime component.
. |-- bin | `-- gda-browser-6.0 `-- share |-- applications | `-- gda-browser-6.0.desktop |-- gnome | `-- help | `-- gda-browser | |-- C | `[···] `-- pixmaps |-- gda-browser-auth-big.png |[···] `-- gda-browser.png

sect1.title: Development files
sect1.para:
The development files are the include files needed to compile C programs, the PKG-CONFIG .pc files, the static libraries and a demo program (like gtk-demo)
. |-- bin | `-- gdaui-demo-6.0 |-- include | `-- libgda-6.0 | `-- libgdaui | [...] `-- lib | |-- libgda-ui-6.0.a | |-- libgda-ui-6.0.la | `-- pkgconfig | `-- libgdaui-6.0.pc `-- share `-- libgda-6.0 `-- demo [...]
